config.AvoidRain.name: Avoid rain
config.AvoidRain.description: Random visits won't happen in rainy days.
config.Blacklist.name: Blacklist
config.Blacklist.description:
Characters you don't want to visit you. 
Separated by spaces (' '). E.g: "Pierre Lewis"
config.advancedConfig.name: Advanced
config.advancedConfig.description: Allow or prohibit certain spouses from going to the island. (By default, all can go).
config.ScheduleRandom.name: Random schedule
config.ScheduleRandom.description: If you enable this, your spouse will visit a randomized map during visits.
config.UseIslandClothes.name: Use beach clothes
AlreadyScheduled.Day: You arranged a visit for tomorrow. This can't be used.
AlreadyScheduled.Week: You arranged a visit for the week. This can't be used.
AlreadyOngoing.Visit: There's a visit currently active. You can't use this.
config.ChildRoom.name: Child room
config.CustomChance.name: Chance of event
config.CustomChance.description: How likely your spouse is to go to the beach. ONLY numbers! (e.g 15 for 15% of chance). Doesn't accept letters.
config.CustomRoom.name: Custom spouse room?
config.CustomRoom.description: Adds a customizable spouse room to the island farmhouse.
config.Child2NPC.description: Configuration related to Child NPC mods (like LittleNPCs).
config.ChildVisitIsland.name: Allow visit?
config.ChildVisitIsland.description: Allows children to visit the island. (Requires LittleNPCs/Child2NPC)
config.UseFurnitureBed.name: Use furniture bed?
config.UseFurnitureBed.description: Lets you use a normal kid bed instead. Can be placed anywhere.
config.UseModSchedule.name: Use mod schedule
config.UseModSchedule.description: Children will have a basic schedule for visits.
config.Childbedcolor.name: Child bed color
config.Childbedcolor.description: The color of your child's bed.
config.Devan_Nosit.name: Devan NPC
config.Devan_Nosit.description: Adds a babysitter to take care of your kids on island days. (Or alternatively, if you just want the NPC in town).
config.SeasonalDevan.name: Seasonal clothes
config.SeasonalDevan.description: Enable it to use Devan's seasonal clothes.
Willy.IslandTicket: Aye, @! You wanna go to the island?
IslandVisit.Question: Go to the island?
Krobus.GoOutside: I'll go outside today...if i'm quick, your people won't notice.$0#$b#Thanks to you, i've become curious of humans' "Entertainment activities".$1
Dialogue.Abigail.LocA: Do you think we can explore this volcano?$0#$b#Willy said we shouldn't get close..$2#$b#But I still brought my sword.$1
Dialogue.Abigail.LocB: Do you ever think of fighting these slimes, @?
Dialogue.Alex.arrival: Oh, hey @. I'm finally here.$0#$b#I can't wait to spend the day with you.$1
Dialogue.Alex.LocB: Nothing's better than the beach on a hot day like this.$1
Dialogue.Elliott.arrival: Oh, @! That was quite the ride!$8#$b#It's a pleasure to see you again.$1
Dialogue.Elliott.LocB: Ah, the view here is quite virtuous$0.#$b#I can feel an idea incoming...$1
Dialogue.Emily.arrival: Hi, @!#$b#This island is full of parrots, it's lovely!
Dialogue.Emily.LocB: @, do you feel it?$0#$b#These crystals are full of powerful energy.$1
Dialogue.Haley.arrival: @, can we go see the island today?$0#$b#There's something about this place that makes me feel at ease.
Dialogue.Haley.LocA: Hi, honey. I'm so glad you're here.$0#$b#I love how sunny the weather is here.$1
Dialogue.Harvey.arrival: Hi, honey.$l#$b#This is so much nicer than being cooped up in the clinic all day.$1
Dialogue.Harvey.LocA: I'll stay inside for a while, @.$0#$b#Make sure you stay hydrated in this weather, alright?$1
Dialogue.Krobus.arrival: This house...decorating my room brings back memories.$0
Dialogue.Krobus.LocA: You said there were caves here...i'll visit them later.$0
Dialogue.Krobus.LocB: I've never seen crystals like these!$0#$b#My people loved crystals, you know.$0#$b#...$2#$b#...You're right. Maybe there's others like me out there.#$b#Thank you, @.$h
Dialogue.Leah.arrival: It's so quiet and peaceful here.$0#$b#It's the perfect weather for some wine.$1
Dialogue.Leah.LocA: The view here is inspiring, i just have to draw it.$0
Dialogue.Maru.arrival: Hey! What's up?$0#$b#I can't wait to see the stars at night.$1
Dialogue.Maru.LocA: @! Have you seen this?$9#$b#It seem there hasn't been volcanic activity in a while.
Dialogue.Maru.LocB: Professor Snail has been telling us about Ginger Island's traditions.$0#$b#Their oral history is amazing.$1
Dialogue.Penny.LocA: Oh, I'm reading the book about a sailor i told you about.$0#$b#It's very interesting.$1
Dialogue.Penny.LocB: Honey, Professor Snail's stories about the island are amazing.$0#$b#I didn't know they had so many traditions!$1
Dialogue.Sam.arrival: Hi, @.$0#$b#It's a nice island... isn't it?$1
Dialogue.Sam.LocA: Hey... have you ever gone inside?$0#$b#...$0#$b#Really?$8
Dialogue.Sebastian.arrival: Hey, I'm glad you're here.$h#$b#How have you been coping with this heat?
Dialogue.Sebastian.LocA: Man, this looks just like in 'Cave Saga X'...
Dialogue.Sebastian.LocB: I'm not one for crowded places.$0#$b#This place is perfect.$h
Dialogue.Shane.arrival: Hey, @.$1#$b#The tropical plants here are great.$1
Dialogue.Shane.LocA: Charlie seems to like this place.$8
Dialogue.Claire.arrival: Hello, dear.$0#$b#I'm ready for this island's hot weather!$1
Dialogue.Claire.LocB: The birds here...$0#$b#There's so many of them. I can hear them chirping.$1
Dialogue.Lance.arrival: Hello, my dear. This house is just as cozy as our farmland's.
Dialogue.Lance.LocA: The caldera in this volcano holds inmense arcane power.#$b#Only the most powerful of mages can cast the spells it requires.
Dialogue.Lance.LocB: The gentle waves of this beach...I've become accustomed to their sound.
Dialogue.Wizard.arrival: Hello, dearest! I'm overjoyed to see you.$1#$b#This place is quite wonderful. You've made the house quite cozy.
Dialogue.Wizard.LocA: The creatures of this island are aware of our presence. It has alerted them.#$b#Their arcane power is inmense...
Dialogue.Wizard.LocB: The forge in this place...the rituals it requires are only mastered by a handful.#$b#Even with such mastery, the results are near impossible to predict.
Dialogue.Olivia.arrival: Hi, sweetie. How is this weather treating you?$0#$b#We should invite Victor here someday.
Dialogue.Olivia.LocA: Sautine City might have some competition...this place is just unique.$1#$b#You remembered i wanted a house in this island...didn't you, dear?$4
Dialogue.Olivia.LocB: My, the ocean in this island is so clear. I would love to paint it some day.
Dialogue.Sophia.arrival: @, can we stay here tonight?#$b#I'm really enjoying this trip.$0#$b#We can? Yay!
Dialogue.Sophia.LocA: Oh, @! Look, there's some fishes in the water.$1#$b#They're nibbling at something.$1#$e#...H-hey, be careful if you go to that volcano over there, okay?$0
Dialogue.Sophia.LocB: This? It's a manga I picked up the other day.$0#$b#Wanna read it together?$0
Dialogue.Victor.arrival: Hi, love. This beach is beautiful!#$b#Compared to Pelican Town, this weather is really hot...
Dialogue.Victor.LocA: So, this is the volcano dwarves used as an energy source...#$b#maybe we could go in someday.
Dialogue.Victor.LocB: Have you seen the bones here, @?#$b#These are quite ancient.
Invite_Abigail: Ginger Island? Tomorrow..?#$b#Sure, @.#$b#I'll bring my sword.$1
Invite_Alex: Awesome! I wanted to jog around the island with you.$1#$b#Let's go tomorrow.
Invite_Elliott: You want to visit the island's beach with me, @?$0#$b#I'm delighted.$1#$b#I'll be there by high noon tomorrow.
Invite_Emily: Yes! Let's go tomorrow, @!$1#$b#I'm feeling a positive energy already.
Invite_Harvey: Some vacations would be nice. Thank you, @.#$b#I'll finish work and prepare for tomorrow.
Invite_Krobus: ...A ticket? Where to?#$b#The island?#$b#Thanks, @. I'll have my coat ready by tomorrow.$1
Invite_Maru: Oh wow, Ginger Island's volcano? Super!#$b#I'll be there tomorrow, just wait for me.$1
Invite_Penny: Oh, an island vacation!$1#$b#That's very kind of you. Let's go tomorrow?
Invite_Sam: Aw, yea! You want to go with me?$1#$b#I'll get things ready for tomorrow.
Invite_Shane: Oh, a ticket?#$b#You want to go to the island?#$b#Alright. Tomorrow noon, how does that sound?$1
Invite_Claire: Oh, an invite? For me?#$b#Thank you, @. Let's go tomorrow.
Invite_Lance: A ticket to Ginger Island?#$b#Perhaps we could visit tomorrow, yes.$1
Invite_Olivia: Oh, my! Ginger Island? That's quite thoughtful of you.#$b#I would love to go tomorrow.
Invite_Sophia: Oh! What's that, @?#$b#You want me to go with you?#$b#Yay! Let's go tomorrow.$1
Invite_Victor: You want to visit the island tomorrow?#$b#That's great! Thank you, @.$1
Invite_Wizard: Ginger Island? Hm... very well, my dear.$1#$b#I suppose I haven't seen its creatures in a while.
Invite_generic_0_1: Yes! I'd love to go.$1#$b#How about tomorrow?
Invite_generic_0_2: @, you want me to visit the island with you?#$b#Of course! I'll see you there tomorrow.$1
Invite_generic_0_3: You feel like going to the island?#$b#Alright. i'll go tomorrow early.
Invite_generic_1_1: Thanks! I'd been missing the island.#$b#I'll prepare everything for tomorrow.
Invite_generic_1_2: ...What is that?#$b#Yes, @. I'd love to go to the island.$1#$b#I'll prepare things to get there early.
Invite_generic_1_3: Yes, of course.#$b#I'd like to go tomorrow, alright?$1
Invite_generic_2_2: What, you want to visit the island tomorrow?#$b#Okay, i'll go with you.$1
Invite_generic_2_3: I have things to do right now, but tomorrow I'm free.#$b#Wait for me there, okay?
Islandvisit_Qi: I knew you'd end up in Ginger Island someday. However, you must keep working hard to achieve perfection.^As encouragement, take these tickets. They'll prove useful.^   -Your friend, Mr. Qi
